alert.note: Alert for Huerfano County Including Walsenburg; Otero County Including La Junta and Western Comanche Grasslands; Western Las Animas County Including Trinidad and Thatcher (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued February 21 at 4:15AM MST until February 21 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A Red Flag Warning has been issued for portions of the area from 11 AM through 6 PM Tuesday afternoon... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 229, 230, AND 232... The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a Red Flag Warning for gusty winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 11 AM this morning to 6 PM MST this evening. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 229, 230 and 232. * Timing...11 AM MST until 6 PM MST on Tuesday. * Winds...Southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 14 percent.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Huerfano County Including Walsenburg; Otero County Including La Junta and Western Comanche Grasslands; Western Las Animas County Including Trinidad and Thatcher
